sentence.Network_en: These five channels of nonverbal communication exist in every culture.
sentence.Network_cn: 非言语交流的这五个方面在每个文化里都存在着。

sentence.Network_en: Gestures are a nonverbal means of expression.
sentence.Network_cn: 打手势是一种非言语的表达方式.

sentence.Network_en: 60 % of all human communication is nonverbal.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们百分之六十的相互交流不是通过语言.

entry.tran: 不使用语言的;非言语的
entry.def: Non-verbal communication consists of things such as the expression on your face, your arm movements, or your tone of voice, which show how you feel about something without using words.

example.ex: Culture plays a large part in non-verbal communication...
example.tran: 文化在非语言交流中起着很大的作用。

example.ex: According to psychologist Martin Lloyd-Elliott, 90 per cent of communication between people is non-verbal.
example.tran: 根据心理学家马丁·劳埃德·埃利奥特的研究，人们之间90％的交流是非语言的。
